author: Gilbert Tilitei
comment: Best fitness app for runners

author: Aaron King
comment: I've been using the paid version of this app since 2013 and have honestly loved it until recently. Features have been disappearing as of late behind a $50/year paywall. The old design was better and wasn't chalk full of adverts peddling users to pay more. The app worked great before. Why ruin something good? Time to look elsewhere

author: Adrian Howes
comment: Paid for this app ages ago. It worked just geat. Then a year or so later adverts started appearing.  Pretty sure the point of paying then was to get rid of ads. Then developer starts taking more and more functionality away saying I have to pay more.  That wasn't the deal. So essentially it's theft.  Next you know they'll be wanting your house. Would be a good app otherwise, if it worked how it used to and what I paid for. In short.  Avoid.

author: charles wood
comment: I have been noticing lately that the app has been stopping in the middle of my running session and I do not notice it until I go to finish a run.  It stops tracking my distance and time.  This gets quite annoying. Please look into this. Using a Oneplus 3T running Android 8.0.

reply.author: Runtastic
reply.content: Hey there, have you already submitted your problem to our Support Team? If not, please submit a ticket to us at help.runtastic.com. We look forward to helping you resolve this issue.

author: A Google User
comment: I have pro version. I bought after evaluating light version. Now it feels i bought ransomeware. As developer demanding ransom for few additional features. He is using loyalty of old buyers to sell additional features , to new buyers. And old buyers have to pay additional ransom. He has to develop new app to sell new features. As new amount is recurring payments. Hate this attitude

author: Bernabe Martinez
comment: I bought the app to have all the features, and now all has been taken away and now YOU GUYS WANT MORE MONEY!!! give me back my features I have already paid for. I really don't care for the new fetures. I know I wont get  a response, but just wanted to join with all the others that already paid for this app before.

reply.author: Runtastic
reply.content: Hey there, have you already submitted your problem to our Support Team? If not, please submit a ticket to us at help.runtastic.com. We look forward to helping you resolve this issue.

author: Rav3nous
comment: App used to work fine until the last update. Apart from the new menu which i dislike, gps signal gets lost after a while. I have used the same track field for my training sessions for over 3 years and never had an issue with tracking. Now the app just loses signal wherever i go. I tried using Google maps to make sure it's not an issue with my service and the Google maps app worked fine.

reply.author: Runtastic
reply.content: Hey, we really appreciate your input. Is this something you've already contacted our Support Team about? If not, please contact us at help.runtastic.com in order for us to help you resolve the issue. Thanks and have a great day!

author: Ruud Westerhout
comment: Overall quality is good, but small topics are annoying. (f.e. highest speed 8,4kmph, average 8,9kmph and no possibility to open a ticket if you do not pay anymore.)

author: Sandro Marques
comment: I can not connect with my TomTom device. Also does not allow to export the walk as Strava does with Relive. No indication of how much you have been wlaked this week or this month... there are room for improvement.

author: Dean Wherry
comment: Been using this app for years. Glitches have disappeared. Have had zero negative issues. Would recommend every time.

author: Erick Brindock
comment: The speed calculation seems to be flawed recently. The real time speed doesn't correspond to any changes in your pace. In the summaries for my last two runs my max speed was less than my average speed and this is mathematically impossible.

author: Nardis Dassler
comment: I brought the pro version to unlock all of the apps features, but soon realised that a subscription fee was required to unlock the rest of the apps features, feels like a paid for a scam...  And while I'm here I might as well meantion that the voice coach that keeps track of your distance and time randomly fast-fowards while running.....very annoying

author: Awadesh Keshav
comment: After every 200m, it's show GPS signal lost and stop working..When I further upload the free version of RUNTASTIC it works very fine.

author: Milind Deshpande
comment: 14-6-2015 My history of the exercise of more than a year is lost after upgrading the the application. Please help me to recover. 28-8-2016 Application not opening on Sony M5

author: Markus Hauselberger
comment: I generally like the app BUT since several weeks my Polar H10 Heartrate monitor won't connect to it any longer. I've tried anything i can think of, including testing another monitor which also does'nt connect.. Works fine with the Polar Beat app.  Without this the app has become useless to me :( Please fix this!

author: Kheizlina Danial
comment: Stop using it since they don't support cheaper device like xiaomi. Not everyone can afford garmin

author: James Showell
comment: Best running app out there. Awesome connectivity and accuracy. Highly motivating with excellent coaching reports while you run. Peerless.

author: Andy Hunter
comment: My phone reports heavy battery usage after the app has finished. The app seems to stay in memory even after closing it thereby using resources.

reply.author: Runtastic
reply.content: Hey, we really appreciate your input. Is this something you've already contacted our Support Team about? If not, please contact us at help.runtastic.com in order for us to help you resolve the issue. Thanks and have a great day!

author: Brian Shotwell
comment: Excellent app I use on training days for running and biking.

author: Hellen Lopez
comment: I really love this app! It has a variety of workouts and it's easy to use Syncs well with other apps. Can they add sprint as a sport feature?

author: Saibal Dasgupta
comment: Good App but I am unable to resend and verify my email id from the app.

author: Crystal Frost
comment: I love everything about this app. The GPS tracking and the map I think are my favorite. I used this when training for my half marathon five years ago and I'm still using it!

author: Scott Wood
comment: Great app. Ive used it for years and does everything i need.

author: Omar Auld
comment: Really helps with achieving my pace goals

author: Calor Bananas
comment: I love Runtastic! This app have become my coach and I have learned a lot about myself and how one grows by seen my progress in it.

author: Mariano Vicario
comment: Is missing samsung gear 3 support

author: Rodrigo Abdo
comment: Best app to work out

author: Ray C
comment: Love it. Better than any fitness app.

author: jonpaul fink
comment: Bad ass app if I can just keep my energy levels up enough to walk lol

author: Vasily Belosloodcev
comment: Mi Band 2 don't connect with your application.

author: Rafael Maia
comment: Great app!

author: Mark Walraad
comment: Does everything I need it to and has most activities. GPS is sometimes a little off.
Okle

author: Al Werner
comment: A great run tracking application.

author: Umang Gopani
comment: Love the app for running.

author: Raimund Rittnauer
comment: Best app eva

author: Olufemi Daramola
comment: Fantastic app.

author: DHARMESH PANDYA
comment: Nice app

author: Tomoyuki Mukai
comment: Love it
